pdgm.pdgmnote: Lamberti1993 pp. 215-217. (etc.) means that only the first one or two forms of the paradigm is given in Lamberti. Only aff forms are given for the monosyllabic verbs.

Lamberti1993 p. 177-259. Lamberti groups the tenses into moods,as given here (note that he makes irreal a separate mood rather than a tnsAspModof cond). The actual Yemsa paradigms in this archive are given only a tense feature.
